item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, December 8, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Syrian rebels seize Damascus and topple Assad dynasty
2. Syrian rebels push towards Damascus as Assad’s grip on power wanes
3. Trump swoops into Paris as Europe prepares for a more transactional relationship
4. Abu Mohammad al-Jolani, the Syrian rebel leader who overthrew the Assad regime
5. [Opinion] Merkel-worship was liberalism at its worst
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, December 8, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
